description: Provide AI assistants with real-time cryptocurrency market data, trading signals, price predictions, and advanced analytics. Enable seamless access to comprehensive crypto insights and quantitative metrics to enhance decision-making. Empower users with AI-generated reports and market sentiment analysis for smarter crypto investments.

tools.name: get_tokens_data
tools.description: Fetch token(s) data from Token Metrics API. Provide either token_id or symbol (or both) along with optional date range.

page.description: Enables pagination and data retrieval control by skipping a specified number of items before fetching data. Page should be a non-negative integer, with 1 indicating the beginning of the dataset.

limit.description: Limit the number of results returned. Default is 50. Maximum is 100.

category.description: Comma Separated category name. Example: yield farming,defi

exchange.description: Comma Separated exchange name. Example: binance,gate

token_name.description: Comma Separated Crypto Asset Names (e.g., Bitcoin, Ethereum)

blockchain_address.description: Use this parameter to search tokens through specific blockchains and contract addresses. Input the blockchain name followed by a colon and then the contract address. Example: binance-smart-chain:0x57185189118c7e786cafd5c71f35b16012fa95ad

tools.description: Fetch token(s) price from Token Metrics API. Provide token_id.
